==== Appearance ====

Appearance is the control center for how things look and feel on your Gnome Desktop.

'''Tests to perform'''

** Change the default theme to the blue "Clearlooks" or "Glossy".  (You can change to any this just stands out more.)
** Change it back.
** Customise the theme if you wish.
** Change the default background.
** Change the Menus and Toolbars look.
** Change font or the way it's displayed on the screen.
** If you have Compiz (3d desktop) enabled try modifying the effects level or switching it off.
